events.msg: Card List: [D1, S2, H5, C7, D8, S10, H11, C12, D13, S6]

Based on the provided card list and my knowledge of the card rankings and scores, I will create a new list of 10 selections that reflects my confidence in the cards.

The card D8 (♦8) is the highest-ranked card according to the scoring system, so I will include it multiple times. The next card I will include is D7 (♦7), followed by other red cards, as they have a higher score than black cards.

Here’s my final list:
